name: The Safegaurd of Goldfinch Rock
description:
It's World War IV. After the events of World War III, the world was sent back to the medieval era, where only remnants of advanced technology remain. Kim Jong-un has sent his army of wooden robots to attack one of the last remaining lighthouses of your kingdom, Goldfinch Rock.

Defend the lighthouse, and don't forget to head around the back of it to buy a few upgrades along the way!

Press 1 & 2 to select melee and ranged weapons.

~Created by Interrobang & Iseeicy
